definition: Legislative Yuan, the legislative branch of government under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan
surname Li
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
courtyard/institution/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.chinese: 澳門立法院選舉開始投票。

sentences.english: The Legislative Yuan is the highest law-making institution.
sentences.chinese: 立法院是最高的立法機構。

sentences.english: The new legislature will assemble in January.
sentences.chinese: 立法院將於一月召集會議。

sentences.english: Frequent changes of prime minister also disrupt legislative work.
sentences.chinese: 頻繁地更換“行政院長”也破壞了“立法院”的工作。

sentences.english: The absolute majority in Taiwan's Legislative Yuan now.
sentences.chinese: 而臺灣現在的立法院一黨獨大。

sentences.english: Legislative Yuan Vice-President Mr. Jiang Bingkun, and delivers a speech the congratulation.
sentences.chinese: 立法院副院長江丙坤先生，並致詞祝賀。

sentences.english: We put on a cabbage , and now he is in the Legislative Yuan!
sentences.chinese: 我們給他安裝了一顆包心菜，他現在還在立法院呢。

sentences.english: The Legislative Yuan, Taiwan's parliament, is dominated by the China-friendly Kuomintang Party.
sentences.chinese: 對中國大陸友好的國民黨在臺灣立法院佔據多數席位。

sentences.english: Ben:That's correct, the officials made a promise in the Legislative Yuan.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，這可是那些長官在立法院做下的承諾喔。

sentences.english: The document has been approved by the Legislative Yuan in advance.
sentences.chinese: 二事先經立法院同意簽訂者。

sentences.english: The final legislative court is the U. S. Court of Appeals for the Armed services.
sentences.chinese: 最後一個法立法院是美國軍事上訴法院。

Mainland Affairs Council (Taiwan), abbr. for 大陸委員會|大陆委员会

Hung Hsiu-chu (1948-), Taiwanese KMT politician
army, civil service and education/all branches of state employment
